review.title: “Responsible for everything from road maintenance to irrigation, plumbing, heating, EVERYTHING.”
review.pros: Pros – Great atmosphere, great people, great location. Builds your social skills and your work ethic. You are inspired to work hard because you love the people you work for and the place you work.
review.cons: Cons – There are really no downsides, besides the fact that if you wanted to take summer classes for school, there would be no way to do that other than online. This job is perfect for anyone who loves the outdoors, loves to work hard and have a good time while doing it.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – keep doing what you are doing.
